'''Sean Guest''' is an American director who served as first assistant director for the [[Season 1|first season]] of ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''. Sean Guest was the first assistant director for ''Death at a Funeral'' which also stars [[Peter Dinklage]] (the actor who plays [[Tyrion Lannister]]).
